about_the_game:
Step foot into your Tin Can and learn the fundamentals of space survival aboard the Medusa Escape Podt hrough a short four steps tutorial!

The demo includes a four step tutorial meant to teach you the basics of the game interactions, systems and components:

  • Tutorial 1: Interactions and Movements
  • Tutorial 2: Vital Needs
  • Tutorial 3: Power Management
  • Tutorial 4: Diagnostics and Repairs
